crumple.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to crush something so that it becomes smaller and bent, or to be crushed in this way
crumple.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Dan tore the page out, crumpled it, and threw it in the wastepaper basket.
crumple.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if your face crumples, you suddenly look sad or disappointed, as if you might cry
crumple.translation[0].definitions[2].de: if your body crumples, you fall down in an uncontrolled way
crumple.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: The blow hit him on the head and he crumpled to the ground.
